title: K-12: Situated Information Utilization Sports Practice Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Taekwondo or Similar Sports, with Foundational Knowledge of Sports Science
context.additional_context: Small-group practice sessions via real-time video platforms. Contextualized simulation exercises using personal devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can integrate situational information reflecting actual game environments (scoreboards, timing, etc.) into practice design
Learners can analyze the impact of situational information on athletes' psychological responses (anxiety, arousal levels)
Learners can explain methods for evaluating practice task effectiveness based on behavioral tracking data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
